actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Hearings held.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Leahy, Committee on the Judiciary, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 49.
name: Jeffrey L. Schmehl
nominee: Jeffrey L. Schmehl, of Pennsylvania, to be United States District Judge for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania
position: United States District Judge for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania
